title: Week In Politics: Hobby Lobby, Jobs Numbers And Immigration Protests
teaser: Regular political commentators E.J. Dionne and Ramesh Ponnuru discuss the Supreme Court's decision on contraception, June jobs numbers and immigration protests in the California city of Murrieta.
contentencoded:
Regular political commentators, E.J. Dionne of The Washington Post and Ramesh Ponnuru of The National Review, discuss the Supreme Court's decision on contraception, June jobs numbers and immigration protests in the California city of Murrieta.

Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
